text: The Eternal Sea is a 1955 American war movie directed by John H. Auer and starring Sterling Hayden, Alexis Smith, Ben Cooper, Dean Jagger, Virginia Grey, Hayden Rorke, Douglas Kennedy, Louis Jean Heydt, Richard Crane, Morris Ankrum, Frank Ferguson. It was distributed by Republic Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:1955 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by John H. Auer
title: The Eternal Sea
